en_definition: once more; another time
pl_definition: jeszcze raz; ponownie
examples: I need to read the book again.
She asked me to say it again.
Let's try again tomorrow.

en_definition: very nearly but not completely or exactly
pl_definition: prawie, niemal, blisko
examples: I almost finished my homework before dinner.
She almost missed the bus this morning.
We're almost there, just a few more minutes.

en_definition: the whole quantity or extent of something; every one of a group; completely
pl_definition: cała ilość lub zakres czegoś; każdy z grupy; całkowicie
examples: All students must complete the assignment.
She ate all the cookies.
The work is all done.

en_definition: the invisible gaseous substance surrounding the earth, a mixture mainly of oxygen and nitrogen
pl_definition: niewidzialna substancja gazowa otaczająca Ziemię, mieszanina głównie tlenu i azotu
examples: The fresh morning air felt cool on my face.
We need to open a window to let some air into the room.
Birds fly through the air with ease.

en_definition: An indefinite article used before singular countable nouns beginning with a consonant sound.
pl_definition: Nieokreślony przedimek używany przed policzalnymi rzeczownikami w liczbie pojedynczej zaczynającymi się od spółgłoski.
examples: I saw a cat in the garden.
She bought a new book yesterday.
He needs a pen to write the letter.

en_definition: An indefinite article used before words beginning with a vowel sound
pl_definition: Nieokreślony przedimek używany przed wyrazami zaczynającymi się od dźwięku samogłoski
examples: I saw an apple on the table.
She is an excellent teacher.
He needs an umbrella because it's raining.

en_definition: A word used to connect words, phrases, or clauses, indicating addition or connection.
pl_definition: Słowo używane do łączenia słów, fraz lub zdań, wskazujące na dodanie lub połączenie.
examples: I like apples and oranges.
She is smart and kind.
We went to the store and bought milk.

en_definition: past tense and past participle of answer; to respond to a question or request
pl_definition: czas przeszły i imiesłów bierny od answer; odpowiedzieć na pytanie lub prośbę
examples: She answered the phone when it rang.
The teacher answered all the students' questions.
He answered the email within an hour.

en_definition: used to refer to an additional person or thing of the same type as one already mentioned or known about
pl_definition: używane do odniesienia się do dodatkowej osoby lub rzeczy tego samego typu, co już wspomniana lub znana
examples: I need another cup of coffee.
Can I have another piece of cake?
She bought another book for her collection.

en_definition: Used to refer to one or some of a thing or number of things, no matter how much or many; whichever of a specified class might be chosen.
pl_definition: Używane do odniesienia się do jednej lub kilku rzeczy, niezależnie od ilości; którykolwiek z określonej klasy mógłby być wybrany.
examples: Do you have any questions?
I don't have any money left.
You can choose any book from the shelf.

en_definition: a curved structure that spans an opening and supports weight
pl_definition: zakrzywiona konstrukcja rozpięta nad otworem, przenosząca ciężar
examples: The ancient Roman aqueduct features a series of stone arches.
They walked under the marble arch at the entrance to the park.
The bridge's main arch is made of reinforced concrete.

en_definition: The upper limbs of the human body from shoulder to hand, or weapons and military equipment.
pl_definition: Górne kończyny ludzkiego ciała od barku do dłoni, lub broń i sprzęt wojskowy.
examples: She crossed her arms while waiting.
The country invested heavily in new arms.
He held the baby in his arms.

en_definition: Used to indicate location, time, direction, or a point of reference.
pl_definition: Używane do wskazywania miejsca, czasu, kierunku lub punktu odniesienia.
examples: I will meet you at the park at 3 PM.
She is good at playing the piano.
Look at that beautiful sunset.

en_definition: pleasing the senses or mind aesthetically
pl_definition: przyjemny dla zmysłów lub umysłu pod względem estetycznym
examples: The sunset over the ocean was beautiful.
She wore a beautiful dress to the party.
The garden looks beautiful in spring.

en_definition: Used to introduce a reason or explanation for something.
pl_definition: Używane do wprowadzenia powodu lub wyjaśnienia czegoś.
examples: I stayed home because it was raining.
She was late because her car broke down.
He succeeded because he worked hard.

en_definition: in a lower position than something else
pl_definition: w niższym położeniu niż coś innego
examples: The temperature is below freezing today.
Please sign your name below the dotted line.
Her score was below the class average.

en_definition: of the color between green and violet in the spectrum
pl_definition: koloru między zielonym a fioletowym w widmie
examples: The sky is blue on a clear day.
She wore a blue dress to the party.
The ocean appears blue from a distance.

en_definition: having no money; financially ruined
pl_definition: bez pieniędzy; zrujnowany finansowo
examples: I can't go out tonight because I'm broke.
After losing his job, he was completely broke.
She felt broke after paying all her bills.

en_definition: Small to medium-sized watercraft for transportation or recreation on water.
pl_definition: Małe lub średnie jednostki pływające służące do transportu lub rekreacji na wodzie.
examples: We saw many colorful boats sailing on the lake.
The fishermen returned to shore with their boats full of fish.
Children enjoy riding in small boats at the park pond.

en_definition: In the space separating two things or indicating a relationship involving two or more items.
pl_definition: W przestrzeni oddzielającej dwie rzeczy lub wskazującej na związek obejmujący dwa lub więcej elementów.
examples: The cat sat between the two chairs.
There is a strong friendship between them.
Choose between the red and blue options.

en_definition: used to introduce a phrase or clause contrasting with what has already been mentioned
pl_definition: używane do wprowadzenia frazy lub zdania przeciwstawnego do wcześniej wspomnianego
examples: I wanted to go to the party, but I was too tired.
She is smart but sometimes makes silly mistakes.
The weather was cold but sunny.

en_definition: A direction or route taken; a series of educational lessons; the progress of time or events.
pl_definition: Kierunek lub trasa; seria lekcji edukacyjnych; postęp czasu lub wydarzeń.
examples: She decided to take a cooking course at the community center.
The ship changed course to avoid the storm.
Over the course of the year, his health improved significantly.

en_definition: past tense of 'come': moved or traveled to a place
pl_definition: czas przeszły od 'come': przyszedł, przybył, przyjechał
examples: She came to the party late last night.
The train came into the station right on time.
He came home after a long day at work.

en_definition: to give a name to someone or something; to summon or contact by name
pl_definition: nadać komuś lub czemuś imię; wezwać lub skontaktować się po imieniu
examples: They called their new puppy Max.
Please call me when you arrive at the station.
The teacher called the students to attention.

en_definition: Easy to perceive, understand, or see through; free of obstructions or ambiguity.
pl_definition: Łatwy do postrzegania, zrozumienia lub przejrzenia; wolny od przeszkód lub niejasności.
examples: The water in the lake was so clear that you could see the bottom.
Please make your instructions clear so everyone understands.
After the storm passed, the sky became clear and blue.

en_definition: beloved or cherished; expensive; used as a polite or affectionate form of address
pl_definition: kochany lub ceniony; drogi; używane jako grzeczna lub czuła forma zwracania się
examples: My dear friend always helps me when I need it.
That necklace is too dear for me to buy.
Dear Sir or Madam, thank you for your letter.

en_definition: A series of thoughts, images, or emotions occurring during sleep; also, a cherished aspiration or ambition.
pl_definition: Seria myśli, obrazów lub emocji występujących podczas snu; także ukochane aspiracje lub ambicje.
examples: I had a strange dream last night.
She dreams of becoming a doctor.
His dream is to travel the world.

en_definition: toward or in the direction of the east
pl_definition: w kierunku wschodnim lub na wschód
examples: The ship sailed eastward across the ocean.
They traveled eastward to reach the mountains.
The storm is moving eastward toward the coast.

en_definition: the front part of the head from the forehead to the chin
pl_definition: przednia część głowy od czoła do brody
examples: She washed her face with cold water.
He had a big smile on his face.
I could see the surprise on her face.

en_definition: to die or cause to die by submersion in water or other liquid
pl_definition: umrzeć lub spowodować śmierć przez zanurzenie w wodzie lub innej cieczy
examples: The sailor drowned when his ship sank during the storm.
Heavy rains drowned the crops in the field.
She tried to drown her sorrows by listening to music.

en_definition: A type of coastal rock formation or sea stack, typically found in the Mediterranean, especially around the island of Capri in Italy.
pl_definition: Rodzaj nadmorskiej formacji skalnej lub słupa morskiego, typowo występujący w regionie Morza Śródziemnego, szczególnie wokół wyspy Capri we Włoszech.
examples: The faraglioni of Capri are iconic landmarks that attract many tourists.
We took a boat tour to see the impressive faraglioni rising from the sea.
Photographers often capture the faraglioni at sunset for stunning images.

en_definition: To discover or locate something through searching or effort.
pl_definition: Odnaleźć lub odkryć coś poprzez poszukiwania lub wysiłek.
examples: I need to find my keys before we leave.
She hopes to find a new job soon.
Can you find the answer in the book?

en_definition: coming before all others in time or order; 1st
pl_definition: przychodzący przed wszystkimi innymi w czasie lub kolejności; 1.
examples: This is my first time visiting New York.
She finished the race in first place.
The first chapter of the book introduces the main character.

en_definition: The visible, glowing gas produced by burning, often hot and bright.
pl_definition: Widoczny, świecący gaz powstający podczas spalania, często gorący i jasny.
examples: The campfire's flames lit up the night sky.
She watched the flames dance in the fireplace.
The building was engulfed in flames during the fire.

en_definition: A mass of small bubbles formed on or in liquid, typically by agitation or fermentation.
pl_definition: Masa małych bąbelków powstałych na lub w cieczy, zazwyczaj w wyniku mieszania lub fermentacji.
examples: The ocean waves created white foam as they crashed against the rocks.
She added soap to the water and stirred it until foam appeared.
The barista carefully poured milk to create foam for the cappuccino.

en_definition: The part of the face above the eyebrows and below the hairline.
pl_definition: Część twarzy znajdująca się nad brwiami i poniżej linii włosów.
examples: She wiped the sweat from her forehead with a towel.
He has a small scar on his forehead from childhood.
The baby's forehead felt warm, so we checked for fever.

en_definition: to fail to remember or retain in memory
pl_definition: stracić z pamięci, przestać pamiętać
examples: I often forget where I put my keys.
Don't forget to call your mother on her birthday.
He tried to forget the painful memories from his past.

en_definition: the quality of being fresh, new, or recently made or obtained
pl_definition: jakość bycia świeżym, nowym lub niedawno wykonanym/uzyskanym
examples: The freshness of the morning air was invigorating.
She appreciated the freshness of the vegetables from the farmer's market.
The artist's work had a sense of freshness and originality.

en_definition: feeling fear or anxiety; scared
pl_definition: odczuwający strach lub niepokój; przestraszony
examples: The loud noise frightened the small child.
She felt frightened walking alone in the dark.
The sudden movement frightened the birds away.

en_definition: A low, flat ship with one deck, propelled by sails and oars, used especially in ancient and medieval times.
pl_definition: Niski, płaski statek z jednym pokładem, napędzany żaglami i wiosłami, używany zwłaszcza w czasach starożytnych i średniowiecznych.
examples: The ancient galley was rowed by slaves.
They discovered a sunken galley from the Roman era.
The pirate ship was designed like a fast galley.

en_definition: the act of moving smoothly and continuously with little effort, as in flying without engine power or sliding effortlessly
pl_definition: akt płynnego i ciągłego poruszania się z niewielkim wysiłkiem, jak w lataniu bez silnika lub ślizganiu się bez wysiłku
examples: The bird was gliding gracefully through the air.
We watched the hang glider gliding over the valley.
The ice skater was gliding across the rink with ease.

en_definition: a precious yellow metallic element, highly valued for its rarity and use in jewelry and currency
pl_definition: szlachetny żółty metal, ceniony za rzadkość i wykorzystywany w jubilerstwie oraz jako środek płatniczy
examples: The ring was made of pure gold.
Many countries keep gold in their reserves.
She won a gold medal in the competition.

en_definition: having or showing elegance, beauty, or smoothness in movement or form
pl_definition: posiadający lub wykazujący elegancję, piękno lub płynność w ruchu lub formie
examples: The dancer's graceful movements captivated the entire audience.
She made a graceful exit from the difficult conversation.
The swan glided across the pond in a graceful manner.

en_definition: of the color between blue and yellow in the spectrum; colored like grass or emeralds
pl_definition: koloru między niebieskim a żółtym w widmie; koloru trawy lub szmaragdów
examples: The grass is green in the spring.
She wore a green dress to the party.
The traffic light turned green, so we could go.

en_definition: of a color intermediate between black and white; dull or gloomy
pl_definition: koloru pośredniego między czarnym a białym; ponury lub przygnębiający
examples: The sky turned grey before the storm.
She wore a grey sweater to stay warm.
His hair has become grey with age.

en_definition: one of two equal parts of something
pl_definition: jedna z dwóch równych części czegoś
examples: I ate half of the pizza.
She spent half the day reading.
The glass is half full.

en_definition: past tense and past participle of 'have', used to indicate possession, experience, or obligation in the past
pl_definition: czas przeszły i imiesłów bierny od 'have', używany do wyrażania posiadania, doświadczenia lub obowiązku w przeszłości
examples: I had a dog when I was a child.
She had already finished her homework before dinner.
They had to leave early because of the storm.

en_definition: The end part of a person's arm beyond the wrist, including the palm, fingers, and thumb.
pl_definition: Końcowa część ramienia człowieka za nadgarstkiem, obejmująca dłoń, palce i kciuk.
examples: She raised her hand to ask a question.
He writes with his left hand.
The baby held my hand while walking.

en_definition: A third-person singular masculine pronoun used to refer to a male person or animal previously mentioned or easily identified.
pl_definition: Zaimek osobowy trzeciej osoby liczby pojedynczej rodzaju męskiego, używany do odnoszenia się do mężczyzny lub zwierzęcia płci męskiej wcześniej wspomnianego lub łatwo rozpoznawalnego.
examples: He is going to the store.
He likes to play soccer with his friends.
He said he would call later.

en_definition: to perceive sound with the ears
pl_definition: postrzegać dźwięk za pomocą uszu
examples: I can hear the birds singing outside my window.
Did you hear what the teacher said about the homework?
She couldn't hear the phone ringing because of the loud music.

en_definition: A pronoun used to refer to a female person or animal previously mentioned or easily identified.
pl_definition: Zaimek osobowy odnoszący się do kobiety lub samicy zwierzęcia wcześniej wspomnianej lub łatwej do zidentyfikowania.
examples: I saw her at the store yesterday.
Her book is on the table.
Can you give this to her?

en_definition: belonging to or associated with a male person or animal previously mentioned or easily identified
pl_definition: należący do lub związany z mężczyzną lub zwierzęciem płci męskiej, o którym wcześniej wspomniano lub który jest łatwo rozpoznawalny
examples: This is his book.
He forgot his keys at home.
His car is parked outside.

en_definition: in what way or manner; by what means
pl_definition: w jaki sposób; jak
examples: How do you make this recipe?
How did you learn to play the piano?
How can I help you with your homework?

en_definition: Expressing the situation of something that is or appears to be enclosed or surrounded by something else.
pl_definition: Wyrażający sytuację czegoś, co jest lub wydaje się być zamknięte lub otoczone przez coś innego.
examples: The book is in the bag.
She lives in New York.
We will meet in the morning.

en_definition: The first-person singular pronoun used by a speaker to refer to themselves.
pl_definition: Zaimek pierwszej osoby liczby pojedynczej używany przez mówcę do odniesienia się do siebie.
examples: I am going to the store.
I love reading books in my free time.
I think we should leave early.

en_definition: exactly, only, or very recently
pl_definition: dokładnie, tylko, właśnie
examples: I just finished my homework.
She is just a child.
He arrived just in time.

en_definition: third person singular present of 'be', used to indicate identity, existence, or state
pl_definition: trzecia osoba liczby pojedynczej czasu teraźniejszego czasownika 'być', używana do wskazywania tożsamości, istnienia lub stanu
examples: The sky is blue today.
She is my best friend.
This book is very interesting.

en_definition: A third-person singular neuter pronoun used to refer to an inanimate object, abstract concept, situation, or animal of unspecified gender.
pl_definition: Zaimek osobowy trzeciej osoby liczby pojedynczej rodzaju nijakiego, używany do odnoszenia się do przedmiotów nieożywionych, pojęć abstrakcyjnych, sytuacji lub zwierząt o nieokreślonej płci.
examples: It is raining outside today.
I found a book and read it yesterday.
It seems like a good idea to wait.

en_definition: To have information, understanding, or awareness of something through experience, learning, or perception.
pl_definition: Mieć informacje, zrozumienie lub świadomość czegoś poprzez doświadczenie, naukę lub postrzeganie.
examples: I know how to swim.
Do you know the answer to this question?
She knows many interesting facts about history.

en_definition: coming after all others in time or order; final
pl_definition: przychodzący po wszystkich innych w czasie lub kolejności; ostateczny
examples: This is the last piece of cake.
He arrived last at the meeting.
She was the last person to leave the room.

en_definition: A polite or formal term for a woman, often implying refinement or high social status.
pl_definition: Uprzejme lub formalne określenie kobiety, często sugerujące wyrafinowanie lub wysoki status społeczny.
examples: The lady at the store helped me find what I needed.
She is a kind and elegant lady who volunteers at the hospital.
Please hold the door open for the lady with the stroller.

pos: verb, preposition, conjunction, noun, adjective, adverb
en_definition: To enjoy or approve of something; similar to; used for comparison; a preference.
pl_definition: Lubić coś; podobny do; używane do porównań; upodobanie.
examples: I like to read books in my free time.
She looks like her mother.
Would you like some coffee?

en_definition: small in size, amount, or degree; not much or many
pl_definition: mały pod względem rozmiaru, ilości lub stopnia; niewiele
examples: The little kitten played with a ball of yarn.
She has little interest in watching sports on television.
We have little time left to finish the project.

en_definition: An adult human male.
pl_definition: Dorosły mężczyzna.
examples: The man walked his dog in the park.
He is a kind man who helps his neighbors.
A young man asked for directions to the train station.

en_definition: belonging to or associated with the speaker
pl_definition: należący do lub związany z mówcą
examples: This book is mine.
That idea was originally mine.
The red car is mine.

en_definition: A unit of time equal to 60 seconds or 1/60th of an hour.
pl_definition: Jednostka czasu równa 60 sekundom lub 1/60 godziny.
examples: Wait just one minute, please.
The meeting will start in five minutes.
It takes about thirty minutes to walk there.

en_definition: almost but not completely or exactly
pl_definition: prawie, niemal, blisko
examples: I nearly missed the bus this morning.
She has nearly finished her homework.
The movie was nearly two hours long.

en_definition: A word used to express negation, denial, refusal, or disagreement.
pl_definition: Słowo używane do wyrażenia negacji, zaprzeczenia, odmowy lub braku zgody.
examples: No, I don't want any coffee right now.
She said no when I asked her to help.
There is no milk left in the refrigerator.

en_definition: A word used to make a statement negative, express denial, or indicate the opposite of something.
pl_definition: Słowo używane do wyrażenia przeczenia, zaprzeczenia lub wskazania przeciwieństwa czegoś.
examples: I am not going to the party tonight.
She does not like spicy food.
This is not the correct answer.

en_definition: A function word indicating relationships such as possession, origin, composition, or association.
pl_definition: Przyimek wskazujący na relacje takie jak posiadanie, pochodzenie, skład lub powiązanie.
examples: The color of the sky is blue.
She is a friend of mine.
A cup of tea would be nice.

en_definition: the number 1; a single person or thing
pl_definition: liczba 1; jedna osoba lub rzecz
examples: I have one apple left in my bag.
She is the one who helped me with my homework.
Can you count from one to ten?

en_definition: away from the inside or center; not in the usual or proper place; into the open
pl_definition: z dala od środka; poza zwykłym lub właściwym miejscem; na zewnątrz
examples: She went out to buy groceries.
The cat ran out of the house.
Please take the trash out.

en_definition: belonging to or associated with the speaker and one or more other people
pl_definition: należący do lub związany z mówcą i jedną lub więcej innych osób
examples: Our house is on the corner of the street.
We need to finish our homework before dinner.
Our team won the championship last year.

en_definition: to move or place something in a particular position or location
pl_definition: umieścić coś w określonym miejscu lub pozycji
examples: Please put the book on the table.
She put her keys in her bag before leaving.
He put a lot of effort into his project.

en_definition: To recall or bring to mind information, experiences, or events from the past.
pl_definition: Przypominać sobie lub przywoływać w pamięci informacje, doświadczenia lub wydarzenia z przeszłości.
examples: I remember my first day at school.
Please remember to buy milk on your way home.
She can't remember where she put her keys.

en_definition: A loose-fitting outer garment, often worn for warmth or ceremonial purposes.
pl_definition: Luźna, długa szata wierzchnia, często noszona dla ciepła lub podczas ceremonii.
examples: She wore a silk robe after her shower.
The judge put on his black robe before entering the courtroom.
In winter, I like to wear a warm robe over my pajamas.

en_definition: A part of a building enclosed by walls, floor, and ceiling; space that can be occupied or used.
pl_definition: Część budynku zamknięta ścianami, podłogą i sufitem; przestrzeń, którą można zająć lub wykorzystać.
examples: I need to clean my room before guests arrive.
There is enough room in the car for all of us.
The hotel room had a beautiful view of the mountains.

en_definition: A hard mineral substance forming part of the earth's surface; to move gently back and forth or from side to side.
pl_definition: Twarda substancja mineralna tworząca część powierzchni Ziemi; delikatnie kołysać się lub poruszać na boki.
examples: The children climbed on the large rock in the park.
She likes to rock her baby to sleep in the rocking chair.
The boat began to rock gently on the calm water.

en_definition: past tense and past participle of 'say', meaning to have expressed something in words
pl_definition: czas przeszły i imiesłów bierny od 'say', oznaczający wyrażenie czegoś słowami
examples: She said she would be here by noon.
He said the meeting was cancelled.
They said goodbye and left the party.

en_definition: Having a circular shape; a stage in a competition; to make something circular; in a circular direction; surrounding something.
pl_definition: Mający kształt koła; etap w zawodach; nadać czemuś kształt koła; w kierunku okrężnym; otaczający coś.
examples: The table has a round top.
They advanced to the next round of the tournament.
She rounded the corner carefully.

en_definition: past tense and past participle of 'sit', meaning to be in a seated position or to have taken a seat
pl_definition: czas przeszły i imiesłów czasu przeszłego od 'sit', oznaczający bycie w pozycji siedzącej lub zajęcie miejsca
examples: She sat quietly in the corner during the meeting.
The cat sat on the windowsill watching birds outside.
We sat together on the park bench and talked for hours.

en_definition: A large body of salt water that is smaller than an ocean and often partially enclosed by land.
pl_definition: Duży zbiornik słonej wody, mniejszy od oceanu, często częściowo otoczony lądem.
examples: We went sailing on the sea last weekend.
The sea was calm and beautiful at sunset.
Many fish live in the sea.

en_definition: protected from direct sunlight or light; having areas of darker color
pl_definition: chroniony przed bezpośrednim światłem słonecznym; mający obszary ciemniejszego koloru
examples: We sat in a shaded area of the park to avoid the hot sun.
The artist used different shaded tones to create depth in the painting.
The garden has both sunny and shaded spots for different types of plants.

en_definition: emitting or reflecting light brightly; radiant
pl_definition: emitujący lub odbijający światło; promienny
examples: The shining sun warmed the beach.
Her eyes were shining with happiness.
He polished the car until it was shining.

en_definition: A third-person singular feminine pronoun used to refer to a female person or animal previously mentioned or easily identified.
pl_definition: Zaimek osobowy trzeciej osoby liczby pojedynczej rodzaju żeńskiego, używany do odnoszenia się do wcześniej wspomnianej lub łatwo identyfikowalnej osoby lub zwierzęcia płci żeńskiej.
examples: She is going to the store.
I saw her yesterday, and she looked happy.
She loves reading books in her free time.

en_definition: the region of the atmosphere and outer space seen from the earth
pl_definition: obszar atmosfery i przestrzeni kosmicznej widziany z Ziemi
examples: The sky was clear and blue today.
Birds were flying high in the sky.
At night, we can see stars in the sky.

en_definition: Used to indicate degree, consequence, or purpose; also as a filler word.
pl_definition: Używane do wskazywania stopnia, konsekwencji lub celu; także jako słowo wypełniające.
examples: I was so tired that I fell asleep immediately.
It was raining, so we decided to stay indoors.
So, what do you think about the new plan?

en_definition: in a gentle, quiet, or careful manner
pl_definition: w sposób łagodny, cichy lub delikatny
examples: She spoke softly to the baby.
The rain fell softly on the roof.
He closed the door softly so as not to wake anyone.

en_definition: An unspecified amount or number of something.
pl_definition: Nieokreślona ilość lub liczba czegoś.
examples: I need some water.
She bought some apples at the market.
Some people prefer coffee over tea.

en_definition: continuing to happen or exist; without moving; despite that
pl_definition: w dalszym ciągu; nadal; bez ruchu; mimo to
examples: The water in the pond is still and calm.
She still lives in the same house after all these years.
It was raining, but we still went for a walk.

en_definition: A narrative or account of events, real or imagined.
pl_definition: Narracja lub opis wydarzeń, prawdziwych lub wymyślonych.
examples: I read an interesting story about ancient civilizations.
She told me a funny story about her trip to the mountains.
The children love listening to bedtime stories.

en_definition: past tense and past participle of talk; to have spoken or conversed
pl_definition: czas przeszły i imiesłów bierny od talk; mówić lub rozmawiać
examples: We talked for hours about our favorite books.
She talked to her friend on the phone yesterday.
They talked about their plans for the weekend.

en_definition: Used to refer to something of a particular kind or degree, often for emphasis or to give examples.
pl_definition: Używane do wskazania czegoś określonego rodzaju lub stopnia, często dla podkreślenia lub podania przykładów.
examples: I have never seen such a beautiful sunset before.
She bought such lovely flowers for the party.
Why would you say such a thing?

en_definition: Used to introduce a clause, refer to something previously mentioned, or indicate a specific thing or person.
pl_definition: Używane do wprowadzania zdania podrzędnego, odnoszenia się do czegoś wcześniej wspomnianego lub wskazywania konkretnej rzeczy lub osoby.
examples: I know that you are right.
That book on the table is mine.
She said that she would come tomorrow.

en_definition: a definite article used to specify a particular noun
pl_definition: rodzajnik określony używany do określenia konkretnego rzeczownika
examples: The cat is sleeping on the sofa.
I went to the store to buy some milk.
She is the best student in the class.

en_definition: A reflexive pronoun used to refer back to the subject of the sentence, indicating that the action affects the same people or things that perform it.
pl_definition: Zaimek zwrotny używany do odniesienia się do podmiotu zdania, wskazujący, że czynność dotyczy tych samych osób lub rzeczy, które ją wykonują.
examples: They prepared the meal themselves.
The children dressed themselves for school.
They should be proud of themselves for completing the project.

en_definition: in, at, or to that place or position
pl_definition: w tym miejscu lub pozycji
examples: I left my keys over there on the table.
There is a cat sleeping on the sofa.
We should go there for our vacation next year.

en_definition: plural form of 'this', used to indicate specific plural nouns that are near in distance or time
pl_definition: liczba mnoga od 'this', używana do wskazywania konkretnych rzeczowników w liczbie mnogiej, które są blisko w przestrzeni lub czasie
examples: These books are very interesting.
I bought these shoes yesterday.
These are my friends from school.

en_definition: A general term for any object, concept, or matter that is not specifically named.
pl_definition: Ogólne określenie na dowolny przedmiot, pojęcie lub sprawę, która nie jest konkretnie nazwana.
examples: I need to buy a few things from the store.
That's a strange thing to say.
The most important thing is to be happy.

en_definition: A third-person plural pronoun used to refer to multiple people or things, or as a singular gender-neutral pronoun.
pl_definition: Zaimek trzeciej osoby liczby mnogiej odnoszący się do wielu osób lub rzeczy, lub jako neutralny płciowo zaimek w liczbie pojedynczej.
examples: They are going to the park after school.
If someone calls, tell them I'll call them back later.
They said the meeting starts at 3 PM.

en_definition: to have a particular thought, idea, or opinion in one's mind
pl_definition: mieć w umyśle konkretną myśl, ideę lub opinię
examples: I think it will rain tomorrow.
She thinks about her family often.
They think the movie was excellent.

en_definition: Ideas, opinions, or mental processes formed in the mind.
pl_definition: Pomysły, opinie lub procesy umysłowe powstałe w umyśle.
examples: I need time to organize my thoughts before making a decision.
Her thoughts on the subject were clear and well-reasoned.
He often shares his thoughts during our morning meetings.

en_definition: Expressing direction, purpose, or relationship between things.
pl_definition: Wyrażający kierunek, cel lub relację między rzeczami.
examples: I'm going to the store.
She gave the book to her friend.
We need to finish this project.

en_definition: first-person plural pronoun referring to the speaker and one or more other people
pl_definition: zaimek pierwszej osoby liczby mnogiej odnoszący się do mówiącego i jednej lub więcej osób
examples: The teacher gave us a homework assignment.
Can you help us with this project?
They invited us to their party next weekend.

en_definition: to a high degree; extremely
pl_definition: w wysokim stopniu; bardzo
examples: The coffee is very hot.
She was very happy with her gift.
It's a very interesting book.

en_definition: moving in one side and out of the other side of an opening, channel, or location; by means of; because of; during the whole period of
pl_definition: przemieszczanie się z jednej strony na drugą przez otwór, kanał lub miejsce; za pomocą; z powodu; przez cały okres
examples: We walked through the park to get home.
She learned about history through reading books.
The store is open Monday through Friday.

en_definition: past tense of 'be', used to indicate existence, identity, or state in the past
pl_definition: czas przeszły czasownika 'być', używany do wskazania istnienia, tożsamości lub stanu w przeszłości
examples: I was at the store yesterday.
She was happy to see her friend.
The weather was sunny last week.

en_definition: first-person plural pronoun referring to the speaker and one or more other people
pl_definition: zaimek pierwszej osoby liczby mnogiej odnoszący się do mówiącego i jednej lub więcej innych osób
examples: We are going to the park.
We need to finish our homework.
We always have dinner together.

en_definition: A clear, colorless, odorless, and tasteless liquid essential for most plant and animal life.
pl_definition: Przezroczysta, bezbarwna, bezwonna i bezsmakowa ciecz niezbędna dla większości roślin i zwierząt.
examples: I drink water every day to stay hydrated.
The plants need water to grow properly.
We went swimming in the cool water of the lake.

en_definition: past tense of 'go', meaning to move or travel from one place to another
pl_definition: czas przeszły od 'go', oznaczający przemieszczanie się lub podróżowanie z jednego miejsca do drugiego
examples: Yesterday, I went to the store to buy some groceries.
She went home early because she wasn't feeling well.
They went on a trip to the mountains last summer.

en_definition: In a good or satisfactory manner; a deep hole for water; in good health; used to express agreement or pause; to rise or flow up.
pl_definition: W dobry lub zadowalający sposób; głęboka dziura na wodę; w dobrym zdrowiu; używane do wyrażenia zgody lub pauzy; wznosić się lub wypływać.
examples: She sings very well.
They dug a well in the garden.
I'm feeling well today.

en_definition: toward the west
pl_definition: w kierunku zachodu
examples: They traveled westward to reach the coast.
The sun sets westward each evening.
The pioneers moved westward in search of new land.

en_definition: past tense plural and second person singular of 'be'
pl_definition: czas przeszły liczby mnogiej i drugiej osoby liczby pojedynczej czasownika 'być'
examples: They were happy to see us yesterday.
If I were you, I would study harder.
The books were on the table this morning.

en_definition: to speak very softly or quietly, often in a secretive or intimate manner
pl_definition: mówić bardzo cicho lub szeptem, często w sposób tajemniczy lub intymny
examples: The children whisper secrets to each other during class.
She whispers words of encouragement to her nervous friend.
The wind whispers through the trees on a quiet evening.

en_definition: of the color of milk or fresh snow, due to the reflection of most wavelengths of visible light
pl_definition: koloru mleka lub świeżego śniegu, odbijający większość długości fal światła widzialnego
examples: The snow was pure white after the storm.
She wore a white dress to the wedding.
The walls of the room were painted white.

en_definition: accompanied by or having possession of; using as an instrument or means; in relation to
pl_definition: w towarzystwie lub posiadaniu; używając jako narzędzia lub środka; w odniesieniu do
examples: I went to the park with my friend.
She wrote the letter with a blue pen.
He is happy with his new job.

en_definition: Used to give an affirmative response or indicate agreement.
pl_definition: Używane do udzielenia twierdzącej odpowiedzi lub wyrażenia zgody.
examples: Yes, I would like some coffee.
Yes, that is the correct answer.
Yes, we can meet tomorrow.

en_definition: damaged or showing signs of use from age or wear
pl_definition: uszkodzony lub wykazujący oznaki zużycia z powodu wieku lub użytkowania
examples: The old book had a worn cover with faded letters.
Her shoes were worn out after years of daily use.
The path was worn smooth by countless footsteps over time.

en_definition: A unit of language consisting of one or more spoken sounds or their written representation, used to express ideas and communicate meaning.
pl_definition: Jednostka języka składająca się z jednego lub więcej dźwięków mówionych lub ich zapisu, używana do wyrażania idei i komunikowania znaczenia.
examples: She carefully chose her words during the important presentation.
The teacher asked the students to write a story using at least 100 words.
His kind words made me feel much better about the situation.
